String username = '%USERNAME%';

User user = [select id from User where Name =: username];

List<Account> accs = [select id,p_c_User__c from Account where name like 'Copilot_Auto%'];

for(Account a : accs)
  a.p_c_User__c = user.id;
  
 
upsert accs;

List<C_ContactObject__c> cco= [select id,p_c_User__c from C_ContactObject__c where name like 'Copilot_Cust%'];
for(C_ContactObject__c cc : cco)
	cc.p_c_User__c = user.id;
	
upsert cco;

List<Case> cases = [select id,p_c_User__c from Case where p_c_ExternalID__c like '%Copilot_Auto%'];

for(Case c : cases)
  c.p_c_User__c = user.id;
  
 
upsert cases;


List<Contact> contacts = [select id,p_c_User__c from Contact where p_c_ExternalID__c like '%Copilot_Auto%'];

for(Contact cts : contacts)
  cts.p_c_User__c = user.id;
  
 
upsert contacts;


List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> custs= [select id,p_c_User__c from JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c where JBCXM__CustomerName__c like 'Copilot_Auto%'];
for(JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c ci : custs)
	ci.p_c_User__c = user.id;
	
upsert custs;
